# Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getPrice
`Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getPrice` â€” Returns the price of the app in the Google Play store.

## Description
```php
Nelexa\GPlay\Model\AppInfo::getPrice ( void ) : float
```

## Parameters
This function has no parameters.

## Return Values
price or 0.00 if the app is free
